snippet: A week before general elections, a spokesman for Greece’s far-right political party, Golden Dawn, attacked two rival legislators on live television, both of them women.
abstract: Arrest warrant is issued for Ilias Kasidiaris, the chief spokesman for Greece's far-right political party Golden Dawn, after he attacks two rival, female legislators on live television; the outburst comes a week before general elections that could determine the country's future in the euro zone.
lead_paragraph: A week before general elections, a spokesman for Greece’s far-right political party, Golden Dawn, attacked two rival legislators on live television, both of them women.

headline.seo: Far-Right Politician in Greece Slaps Rival on TV
headline.main: Far-Right Politician in Greece Slaps Rival on TV
headline.print_headline: Contentious Greek Politics Turns Physical as Far-Right Legislator Slaps Rival on TV
